title: Geo Coordinates
description: The geographic coordinates of a place. Based on http://schema.org/GeoCoordinates.

id.title: Coordinates Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the coordinates.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of what the coordinates identify.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: The signed vertical coordinate of a geographic point.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The signed horizontal coordinate of a geographic point.

altitude.title: Altitude
altitude.description: The specific altitude of the defined coordinate. The value conforms to the WGS84 datum and is measured in meters.
